Simple Integration

Three Steps to Total Protection

Get up and running in under 5 minutes

01

Add One Line of Code

Install our SDK and add a single API call to your checkout. Works with any stack.

const result = await payguard.score(transaction)
02

AI Analyzes in Real-Time

Our neural network evaluates 200+ risk signals including velocity, geo, and behavioral patterns.

// Processing time: ~42ms average
03

Get Instant Decision

Receive approve/review/decline with full explainability. Take action with confidence.

{ decision: "approve", score: 12 }
